name: Rite to Flight
description:
Rite to Flight: A Point-and-Cluck Adventure is a pun-based adventure game like you remember. Feathers will fly as you solve puzzles and attempt to escape the room in this egg-sellent game of poultry proportions!

Use the left mouse button to interact with objects and the environment. Use the Mystical Wishbone from the inventory to interact with items in the world.
